name: Winions: Mana Champions
description: Grab your best hero, summon hordes of minions from your best card deck, and steal treasure chests from other players!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card with at least 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
